title: Normalization Test Vector Set
description: Schema for a file containing a set of normalization test vectors, based on the input example.

$schema.description: The JSON Schema URL this document adheres to.

vectorSetId.description: A unique identifier for this set of test vectors.

specVersion.description: The version of the specification (e.g., Civic Exchange Protocol) the vectors are testing.

vectorVersion.description: The version of the test vector set itself.

description.description: A brief description of the purpose of this test vector set.

generatedAt.description: The date the test vector file was generated (YYYY-MM-DD).

vectors.description: An array of individual normalization test cases.

id.description: Unique identifier for the specific test case (e.g., norm_edge_001).

description.description: A descriptive name for the test case.

function.description: The name of the normalization function being tested (e.g., normalize_legal_name).

input.description: The input data for the normalization function. Keys are dynamic (e.g., legal_name, address, date_str).

expected.description: The expected output from the normalization function.

notes.description: Optional notes or rationale for the test case.
